title: Hour 2: Black Hole?
description:
In this episode, Stephen A., Keyshawn Johnson, and Mina Kimes debate whether or not the Raiders rocky start is an accurate assessment of their skill level. Plus, Jeff Saturday joins the crew to react to Stephen A.'s Top 5 NFL teams after Week 5. Our crew gives their takes on Commanders Head Coach Ron Rivera saying what he believes is to blame for their lackluster start to the season. Plus, is the path to the Super Bowl more of a challenge in the AFC or NFC? And, do the New England Patriots have a QB controversy on their hands with the sudden success of 3rd string QB Bailey Zappe?

itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Are the Raiders better than a 1-4 record?
